website_summaries.verdict: An excellent keratin treatment by a top, salon-quality brand that produces noticeable results for most users.
pros: Combines keratin with hydrolyzed silk to smooth and condition hair and increase elasticity
Earns praise for controlling frizz and making hair soft and shiny
cons: Quite pricey for a fairly small bottle, but most users think that it's a worthy investment

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it does, a bit pricey though.
customer_reviews.text: I was previously using tresemme keratin smooth oil, just wanted to try something different and this had great reviews. Only downside, it's hard to gauge how much to use, but if you accidentally use too much, it weighs your hair down with a greasy texture. product_meta.title: CHI Keratin Silk Infusion , 6 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Size:6 OunceCHI Keratin Silk Infusion is a powerful reconstructing complex that heals and hydrates dry, damaged hair. While natural keratin rebuilds the hair's cuticle, silk penetrates deep into the hair to retain moisture and smooth the cuticle. This unique compound dramatically improves elasticity and prevents future breakage, while adding intense hydration that restores softness and shine.

BRAND STORY
CHI haircare and tools are manufactured by Farouk Systems a Houston based company.
